name: Wildwood: A Town Building Game
summary: Wildwood is a city building strategy game that is all about expansion. Start from nothing. As you gather resources and progress through the Tech Tree you will unlock new technologies that will help you survive. To reach more valuable resources you will need to expand. Deploy a logistics network of Trains and Wagons to connect your settlement together. As you continue to gather, build, expand, and connect you will be able to turn your surviving settlement into a thriving town.
